posts.text:
www.dailykos.com/stories/2025...

Musk’s popularity is in free fall—he’s polling worse than Trump, Rubio, and even Netanyahu, who’s facing global outrage over Gaza. That’s right, Elon managed to out-villain a guy accused of bombing civilians. Quite the achievement.

#Trump #Musk #Netanyahu
